message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable for you. To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000. I'm open to discussing further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is quite a bit lower than I had in mind. This product offers significant value, and I believe a price closer to its worth is fair.  Would you consider $11,500?
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not comfortable with $11,500. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000?
